poker.object

Class SetCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.object.SetCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hand

    public class SetCard
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of cards can be a empty set. There aren't two cards same id in a set of cards.

      • compareSetCard

        public int compareSetCard(SetCard hand2)
        Compare the list of cards of this SetCard with another setCard
        Parameters:
        hand2 - another set of cards which is compared with this set of cards
        Returns:
        1: the list of cards of this SetCard is bigger than hand2
        2: the list of cards of this SetCard is smaller than hand2
        0: the list of cards of this SetCard is equal hand2
        -1: Error!

      • isSetCard

        public boolean isSetCard()
        Check the set of cards is a valid set of cards or not?
        Returns:
        TRUE if the set of cards is valid
        FALSE if the set of cards isn't unique or it has some invalid cards.
